content.body: Next week I'm free in both timeslots
And the week after we are aligned again

Ok, then I propose we shift the meeting this week only forward by an hour to help us move forward here. Unless anyone who would like to attend to discuss the ESM source phase design has any issues with making that time this week?
Btw I also have an update about defer imports :)
